Package Feedback

Class SuggestionsHandler

java.lang.Object
Feedback.SuggestionsHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SuggestionsHandler extends Object implements Serializable
Manages operations related to suggestions made by camp committees for camps.

  • Method Details

    • makeSuggestions

      public void makeSuggestions(Camp camp, CampCommittee campCommittee)
      Creates a suggestion for a specific camp by a camp committee.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp to make a suggestion for.
      campCommittee - The camp committee who is making the suggestion.

    • viewSuggestions

      public ArrayList<Suggestion> viewSuggestions(CampCommittee campCommittee)
      Displays suggestions made by a specific camp committee that are awaiting approval.
      Parameters:
      campCommittee - The camp committee whose suggestions are being viewed.
      Returns:
      List of suggestions made by the committee awaiting approval.

    • editSuggestions

      public void editSuggestions(Camp camp, CampCommittee campCommittee)
      Edit a previously submitted, unapproved suggestion made by a camp committee.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp associated with the suggestions.
      campCommittee - The camp committee who made the suggestions.

    • deleteSuggestions

      public void deleteSuggestions(Camp camp, CampCommittee campCommittee)
      Delete a previously submitted, unapproved suggestion made by a camp committee.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp associated with the suggestions.
      campCommittee - The camp committee who made the suggestions.
